timeline.message:
[BEAM-8280] no_annotations decorator

Adds `@decorators.no_annotations` decorator to disable on a specific
function.

Split out of #10717

timeline.bodyText: Better to split into three test methods.
timeline.author: kennknowles
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -154,5 +156,23 @@ def fn(a, b=None, *args, foo, **kwargs):
       decorators.getcallargs_forhints(fn, 5)
 
 
+class DecoratorsTest(unittest.TestCase):
+  def test_no_annotations(self):

replies.bodyText: It is one test. I'll rewrite it to make it clear. First it shows that the pipeline raises a TypeCheckError with annotations and then it shows no exceptions raised without them.
replies.author: udim
